title: Players that go AFK
body: It fkn pisses me off that Riot Games still decides to do nothing to people that decide to go AFK and cost their team the games. However, if someone was to flame another player even a little bit they are hit with a ban. it's fkn stupid and still nothing is done about it. I just had a lee sin that started really well then decided he was 'bored', soft inted 3 deaths and went AFk whilst I was in promos. Why tf should another players toxicity cost me my promos, and knowing no repercussions will be made makes it even worse. It's about time Riot actually started punishing these players instead of doing nothing about it.

replies.body: I too think it's a joke. I'd rather be flamed than have a teammate go AFK.
